user.title: User
user.description: Represents a user of the platform.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the user account was created.

business.title: Business
business.description: Represents a business profile created by a business owner.

ownerUid.description: The UID of the user who owns this business profile.

industry.description: The industry the business operates in.

stage.description: The current stage of the business (e.g., MVP, Seed, Growth).

pitch.description: A short pitch or summary of the business.

targetRaise.description: The funding amount the business is seeking.

raisedAmount.description: The amount of funding already raised.

profileComplete.description: A percentage representing how complete the profile is.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the business profile was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp of when the business profile was last updated.

proposal.title: Proposal
proposal.description: A funding or business proposal created by a business owner.

businessId.description: The ID of the business this proposal belongs to.

description.description: A detailed description of the proposal.

status.description: The current status of the proposal.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the proposal was created.

investorProposal.title: Investor Proposal
investorProposal.description: A proposal created by an investor detailing their investment interests.

investorUid.description: The UID of the user who created this proposal.

title.description: A headline for the proposal, e.g., 'Seed Funding for SaaS Startups'.

industries.description: A list of industries the investor is interested in.

minCheckSize.description: The minimum investment amount for a single deal.

maxCheckSize.description: The maximum investment amount for a single deal.

thesis.description: A detailed description of the investor's thesis or what they look for.

status.description: The current status of the proposal.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the proposal was created.

loanProduct.title: Loan Product
loanProduct.description: A loan product or offering created by a banker.

bankerUid.description: The UID of the banker who created this loan product.

title.description: The name of the loan product, e.g., 'Small Business Term Loan'.

description.description: A description of the loan, its benefits, and target audience.

interestRate.description: The interest rate or range, e.g., '10.5% - 14% p.a.'.

status.description: The current status of the loan product.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the product was created.

article.title: Article
article.description: An informational article written by a business advisor.

authorUid.description: The UID of the user who wrote the article.

summary.description: A short summary of the article.

content.description: The full content of the article, potentially in Markdown format.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the article was created.

query.title: Query
query.description: A question posted by a user to the community.

authorUid.description: The UID of the user who posted the query.

authorName.description: The name of the user who posted the query.

description.description: The detailed description of the query.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the query was created.

solution.title: Solution
solution.description: An answer or solution posted by an advisor in response to a query.

queryId.description: The ID of the query this solution is for.

advisorUid.description: The UID of the advisor who posted the solution.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the solution was posted.

view.title: View/Activity
view.description: Represents an interaction from an investor on a business profile.

businessId.description: The ID of the business being viewed.

investorId.description: The UID of the investor performing the action.

message.title: Message
message.description: A single message within a conversation thread.

fromUid.description: The UID of the message sender.

toUid.description: The UID of the message recipient.

read.description: Whether the message has been read by the recipient.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the message was sent.

log.title: Log
log.description: An audit log entry for a significant action on the platform.

uid.description: The UID of the user who performed the action.

targetType.description: The type of entity the action was performed on (e.g., 'business', 'proposal').

targetId.description: The ID of the entity that was targeted.

metadata.description: Any additional data relevant to the log entry.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the log was created.

/businesses/{businessId}.description: Stores business profiles created by users.

/loanProducts/{loanProductId}.description: Stores loan products created by bankers.

/articles/{articleId}.description: Stores articles written by business advisors for the Knowledge Hub.

/queries/{queryId}.description: Stores questions posted by users for advisors.

/queries/{queryId}/solutions/{solutionId.description: Stores solutions posted by advisors to a query.

/views/{viewId}.description: Logs investor interactions with business profiles.

/messages/{threadId}/messages/{messageId.description: Stores individual messages within a conversation thread.

/logs/{logId}.description: Stores audit logs for important platform actions.
